news.title: End of an era: Warren Buffett will ask Berkshire board to replace him as CEO with Greg Abel
news.summary: Buffett said he will still 'hang around' to help, but the final word on company operations and capital deployment would be with Abel, 62.

news.title: 6 big things investors learned from Warren Buffett at this year's Berkshire shareholder meeting
news.summary: CNBC takes a look at some of the biggest takeaways from the annual gathering. Here are the top three stories from CNBC's coverage of the event.

news.title: Top Wall Street analysts are bullish on these 3 dividend stocks for stable returns
news.summary: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three dividend-paying stocks, including AT&T and Texas Instruments.

news.title: Trump posts AI-generated photo of himself dressed as the pope
news.summary: President Trump earlier this year jokingly called himself a "king" after he moved to end the congestion pricing program in New York City.

news.title: Berkshire shareholders are 'stunned' as Warren Buffett announces plan to step down after 6 decades
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway shareholders had no idea how historic this year's event would be. Berkshire Hathaway shareholder: "I think it's going to be a great year"

news.title: A real-estate giant wants sellers to list their homes privately. Will homeowners benefit?
news.summary: Some real-estate agents want sellers to keep their for-sale listings private. Selling a home has been tough in a sluggish market, but now some sellers want to keep it private.

news.title: If you read April’s jobs report, you won’t be surprised by the No. 1 ‘best job’ in America
news.summary: There was strong jobs growth in one industry in April, but that does not necessarily add up to a healthy U.S. labor market.

news.title: Buffett passes the torch — here’s what Berkshire loyalists should know, from a longtime insider
news.summary: . Buffett’s CEO successor Greg Abel may bring a change in style, greater collaboration. Abel is a former CFO and COO of Berkshire Hathaway.

news.title: Investing legend Warren Buffett to step down as head of Berkshire Hathaway after 6 momentous decades
news.summary: Warren Buffett says he will step down as CEO of Berkshire Hathaway Inc. at year-end. He will ask the board to formally hand the reins to Greg Abel.

news.title: The best Kentucky Derby bet may actually be investing in Churchill Downs
news.summary: Churchill Downs Incorporated is the owner of the track where the famed namesake race is run. Some analysts say its stock has plenty of upside right now.
